author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-4069 Redesign of JD toward the main goal of classpath separation for container (system) code.
UserErrorHandler interface comprising configuration and error handling plus default implementation.

author: mfriedenhagen
msg: * Because PMD now comes with multiple moduls depending on the language
we must not only update the version.
* The API for detecting languages was changed as well.
* Additionally, rules in PMD do not end on `Rule` anymore, so
custom configurations need to be adapted as well.

author: tflobbe
msg: SOLR-6704: Added unit tests that uncovered TrieDateField bug in branch 4.10.x

author: sershe
msg: HIVE-8736 : add ordering to cbo_correctness to make result consistent (Sergey Shelukhin, reviewed by Laljo John Pullokkaran)
